A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Even if I wasn't a huge Star Wars fan\, I would have hated this movie. It's a mess of dead end plot holes\, undeveloped characters remaining unchanged\, and a clear lack of coherent theme. I can't think of a single way in which this movie moves the needle at all for the Star Wars Franchise besides ruining the interesting plot lines and character arcs that The Force Awakens began..
